name: JoeDaddy
0:
”Alexa, ask JoeDaddy how do I handle my crying baby”
”Alexa, tell JoeDaddy my baby has gas”
”Alexa, ask JoeDaddy what is the cycle”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: joe daddy
des:
This skill is created by a new Dad! It's purpose is to help new and returning parents feel confident in handling their baby. We all know (or will learn), trying to figure how to calm a baby while they are loudly crying, can be a challenge! Rest assured, babies are relatively easy to figure out. With JoeDaddy, you've got this whole baby raising business!

Just ask (or tell) JoeDaddy questions and statements related to how your baby is acting and the skill will return very useful information to help you calm your baby.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
